greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = min(n, A263273(n)), where A263273 is bijective base-3 reverse.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..59048
program: A030102(n) = { my(r=[n%3]); while(0<n\=3, r=concat(n%3, r)); subst(Polrev(r),x,3); } \\ After code in A030102.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 12 2020
